author: Swayze
title: “Division Is an Illusion”
content:
(Verse 1)
Left, right, left, right — I’m done with the fight
Tired of the noise in the dead of the night
We’re marching in circles, we’re losing the view
They draw the lines, but we bleed the same hue

(Pre-Chorus)
They sell us the story, they write all the rules
While we tear each other down like fools

(Chorus)
We are one, we are human
Division is an illusion
Made by the rich to control the poor
They don’t have power if we don’t believe anymore

(Verse 2)
Screens keep us blinded, truth fades to gray
They whisper the lies and we drift away
But hearts beat louder than the sound of fear
If we stand together, the truth is clear

(Pre-Chorus)
They build their walls, but we break them apart
The change begins inside our hearts

(Chorus)
We are one, we are human
Division is an illusion
Made by the rich to control the poor
They don’t have power if we don’t believe anymore

(Bridge)
No more left, no more right
Just hands reaching for the light
They can’t own what they can’t define
We are free, we decide

(Final Chorus)
We are one, we are human
Division is an illusion
Made by the rich to control the poor
They don’t have power if we don’t believe anymore

(Outro)
Left, right, left, right — I want it to end
We’re not enemies, we’re friends
